text: Theresa Russell (born March 20, 1957 in San Diego) is an American actress. She has done many movies. Some of the better-known ones are The Last Tycoon (1976), Black Widow (1987) and Spider-Man 3 (2007). Russell was married to British movie director Nicolas Roeg (born 1928) from 1982 until they divorced. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Theresa Russell
